To  Don Catt
From  Rebecca Moon
Subject  Rogue Street concerts ______________________________________________________________________________ Dear Don Please find attached the schedule for Rogue Street’s tour of the USA in the summer. The band arrives on July 3 and returns to the UK on July 31. The aim is to play all the main music festivals in the country. We have already booked most of the concerts but we are having problems contacting some of the organizers. Why don’t we arrange a call next week to discuss this? We also need some more help. The band are going to travel between some cities by bus. How much time do we need to travel between San Diego and Seattle? And between Atlanta and Miami? Thanks for all your help on this project. With very best wishes Rebecca
